Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedefptahankh with a lappet-wig, a carved face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding relief representations of an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the legs are inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in ten rows of incised Hieroglyphs, there is a back-pillar and the feet rest on a plinth.
